The photo of the purported advisory was: 2020, and has been shared nearly 500 times.
The advisory: s Hindi-language text translates to English as an important message stating that from April 1, 2020, all banks will require NPR documents for account access, and failure to produce them will result in blocked accounts.
The Reserve Bank of India: RBI), the governing body of India's banking system, refuted the claim as "fake news" and confirmed that neither banks nor RBI have asked for any NPR documentations from customers.
